content: knit to one stitch before end of round turn you re now on the ws mds purl all st to reach the last heel st turn you re now on the rs mds k to the next double stitch ds turn do not work the double stitch mds p up to the next ds turn still don t work the double stitch repeat the last two row until you have 14 regular st in the center of your heel knit to end of round second half of heel knit in lace pattern until you reach the heel section again then knit to first ds knit ds as one mds purl to first ds purl ds as one turn mds knit to next ds knit ds as one k1 turn mds purl to next ds purl ds as one p1 turn repeat the last two row until you are at the end of both sides one double stitch left on each side leg once you complete the heel you will set up your stitches for the leg as follows *m1 knit one repeat of lace pattern* twice then *m1 k16* twice the created stitches will be purled every round you will now begin knitting in lace pattern on both halves of the sock continuing the lace pattern on the front and beginning the back lace pattern on the same row as the front knit in lace pattern until 1in 2 5cm from your desired final leg length begin knitting the twisted 1x1 sock ribbing by *ktbl1 p1* repeat from * to * until you reach 1 in 2 5cm in length use jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind-off to bind off as follows 1 start with a backward yarn over on the right needle so you wrap the yarn around the needle clockwise instead of the usual counterclockwise 2 knit one stitch 3 pass the second stitch the yarn over over the first one and drop it off the needles 4 add a regular yarn over 5 purl one stitch you should now have three stitches on your right needle 6 pass the second stitch over the first stitch on the right needle and drop it off the needles 7 pass the last stitch over the first stitch and drop it off the needles as well essentially you are knitting a double decrease here 8 add a backward yarn over 9 knit one stitch you should be back to three stitches on your right needle again 10 pass the second and then the third stitch over the first one and drop both off the needle the way you did before 11 continue repeating steps 4-10 until last stitch cut yarn and run through the st weave in all ends and block if desired fern lace - written instructions round 1 *k9 yo k1 yo k3 sk2po* repeat from * to * round 2 and every even numbered row knit round 3 *k10 yo k1 yo k2 sk2po* repeat from * to *
